messages.content: The choice on Thursday 8th June: Lib Dem MPs who will champion their communities.
More Conservative MPs won't stop Theresa May's NHS and school cuts.
Everyone knows Labour isn't going to win this time...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems have unveiled plans to invest £6.9bn in schools and colleges, reversing government cuts.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows Labour can't win. Voting Lib Dem to get community champions.

issues.education: Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.
issues.health: NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study. Tory cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse. NHS protest: Tens of thousands march against hospital cuts.

quotes.text: NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study.
Schools face the worst funding cuts in 20 years.
The Lib Dems have unveiled plans to invest £6.9bn in schools and colleges, reversing government cuts.
The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
There is no realistic chance of us winning.
We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader.
NHS protest: Tens of thousands march against hospital cuts.

Everyone knows Labour isn't going to win this time.
